overview: Slaney Studios first LGBT themed short film. This 20 minute short depicts the unique and gentle love story of Mark and Charlie. They meet every day for a walk and fall deeply in love. When Mark's father finds out about their relationship everything begins to fall apart. This film stars Jiayue Chi (The Bridge's Li Xiu) and Sean Norton (Debut with Slaney Studios). Written and Directed by Luke Spellacy Shaw. Scored by Luke Spellacy Shaw.
tagline: Once More A Love In Love
title: Found by the Treeside
